main event: A woman in Houston, Texas, reported seeing a strange object in the sky on February 4, 1966.
interesting points: The object appeared to be a big airplane with no wings and was copper-colored and reflective like a polished mirror., Witnesses described the object moving rapidly, making a complete circle, and then taking off straight up at tremendous speed., The object made a horrible whistling sound as well as a buzzing noise., The sighting lasted about 5-10 minutes, during which the object changed brightness and shape., Neighbors reported feeling scared and did not want to go outside during the sighting.
sighted object: a strange object resembling a big airplane with no wings
witness description: The main witness was a 58-year-old teacher, and her husband and neighbors also observed the event.
